resources.string: (1) Toggle the start service button once the app starts.
(2) Click the Check status button after starting the service to know the running status of your mobile camera.
(3) A Toast message will appear at the start of any camera activities.
(1) Toggle the start service button once the app starts.
(2) Click the Check status button after starting the service to know the running status of your mobile camera.
(3) A Toast message will appear at the start of any camera activities.
